articles.title: Ford forecasts electric vehicle division will lose $3bn this year - Financial Times
articles.description: Costs mount as US company pursues goal to make 2mn battery cars and trucks by end of 2026
articles.content:
Ford said it expected to lose $3bn making electric vehicles this year, as it gave investors their clearest look yet at the outlook for the companys nascent battery-powered car and truck business.
